kysymykset.kysymys: Which town is Finland's capital? A:Ylivieska B:Helsinki C:Kouvola D:Toejoki
How many people live in Finland? A:Viisi B:50 C:500 D:5000000
How tall is Turku castle? A:10 metriä B:100 metriä C:200 metriä D:1000 metriä
What is capital of Varsinais-Suomi? A:Salo B:Raisio C:Turku D:Naantali
When was Turku cathedral built? A:1100's B:1200's C:1300's D:1400's
When was handcraft museum in Luostarinmäki founded? A:1930 B:1934 C:1938 D:1940
